firmos e&longs;&longs;e angulos parietum / &longs;ed uitium ade&longs;&longs;e indicant in
media longitudinis fundamenti.

Itaque fundamen
tis prouidi&longs;&longs;e ubi opus &longs;it: tunc pro operis magnitudine
et &longs;oli firmitate iuxta parietem angu&longs;tum fodito puteum
&longs;ed profundum u&longs;que &longs;olidum firmumque inuenias: &longs;uffo&longs;&longs;oque
illic infimo pariete confe&longs;tim ordinario lapide &longs;uffarcina
to: et &longs;inito dure&longs;cat.

Cum duruerit / alium &longs;imilem alibi
puteum info dito / parique ratione &longs;uba&longs;truito / &longs;initoque &longs;icce
&longs;cat.

Hoc igitur pacto traductis fo&longs;&longs;uris parieti firmamen
tum &longs;ub&longs;titues.

Quod &longs;i ex &longs;ententia &longs;olum con&longs;tans non præ
&longs;tabitur: tunc certis locis paulo ab angulis di&longs;tantibus hinc
atque hinc ad radices parietis utroque latere hoc e&longs;t in area quæ
&longs;ub tecto e&longs;t / et area quæ extra e&longs;t e regione factis puteis fi
gentur pali in &longs;olo conferti&longs;&longs;imi: et ' in&longs;ternentur tignis omni
ex parte firmi&longs;&longs;imis &longs;ecundum parietis longitudinem.

Po&longs;t
id traiicientur cra&longs;&longs;iores et longe ualidi&longs;&longs;imi trabes per tran&longs;
uer&longs;as parietis radices: ita ut in tignorum &longs;traturas in&longs;ideant:
et dor&longs;o parietem qua&longs;i pontes iuga ue &longs;u&longs;tineant.

In omni
bus i&longs;tiu&longs;modi quas recen&longs;uimus in&longs;taurationibus prouiden
dum e&longs;t ne &longs;it nouum hoc quod adiungis opus aliqua ex par
te &longs;ui imbecillius quam ut onus &longs;u&longs;ceptum diuque bem que perferat .

Nam illico tota parietis moles in hanc ip&longs;am imbecilliorem
partem &longs;idendo conflueret.

Sin autem illic fundamenta ad medi
um parietis erunt commota: et &longs;upernæ partes ille&longs;æ con&longs;tant:
tunc &longs;ignabis in parietis facie arcum rubrica amplum quantum
exigit res: hoc e&longs;t ut concipiat &longs;ub &longs;e id totum quod commo
tum &longs;it.

Tum ab altero quouis capite arcus i&longs;tius incipiens
tran&longs;fodito parietem foramine non maiore / quae quod unicum ad
&longs;e capiat lapidem arcus: quem nos lapidem alibi cuneum
nuncupauimus: cuneumque hunc ip&longs;um ad &longs;uas lineas in&longs;tituito
uti radius a centro i&longs;tius cicli productus diriget.

Po&longs;t id pro
ximum aliud contiguum foramen adaperito: &longs;imilique cuneo
repleto: ac deinceps opere &longs;ucce&longs;&longs;iuo arcum pficito.

Succe
det in&longs;titutum nullo cum periculo .
Columna et o&longs;&longs;a &longs;icubi erunt debilitata / &longs;ic re&longs;titues.

Sub
&longs;truito ad trabem operis arcum ualidum tegula et gyp&longs;o &longs;ub
iectis quoque ex gyp&longs;o pilis ad eam rem accomodatis / ut ar
cus i&longs;tic qui noui&longs;&longs;ime &longs;ubducetur apertiones ueteres bene
compleant: fiatque a&longs;tructio hæc &longs;umma fe&longs;tinantia nulla operis
intermi&longs;&longs;ione.

Gyp&longs;i natura e&longs;t ut inter &longs;icci&longs;cendum excre
&longs;cat.

Ergo a&longs;tructio hæc noui&longs;&longs;ima humeris &longs;uis quoad erit
in &longs;e &longs;u&longs;ceptum &longs;ublenabit onus ueteris parietis formicis ue.
Tu paratis rebus illinc læ&longs;am columnam eximito: et loco
integram &longs;ub&longs;tituito.

Quod &longs;i ex materia fulcire et &longs;ubiici
bus eniti libuerit: ex trabibus &longs;tateras &longs;ubmittito: et produ
ctum earum &longs;portulis harena onerato.

Extollent pondus &longs;en
&longs;im &longs;ine ulla qua&longs;&longs;atione coæquabiliter: et paries &longs;i a perpen
diculo di&longs;ce&longs;&longs;erit: &longs;tatuito tigna ut hæreant adpacta parieti.

His &longs;ingulis adiicito &longs;ingula fulcimenta ex materia bene ua
lida pedibus imis a pariete diuaricatis.

Tunc uectibus aut
cuneolis &longs;en&longs;im &longs;tringito / ut parietem urgeant.

Sic di&longs;tribu
tis conatibus compingendo paries ad perpendiculum re&longs;ti
tuetur.

Si id non licuerit / firmabis fulctura trabium firmo
in &longs;olo: et trabes bene picabis pice et oleo: nequid calcis con
tactu uitientur.

Mox a&longs;truito quadrato ex lapide anterides:
ita ut picata fulctura conue&longs;tiatur.

Incidet forte ut colo&longs;&longs;us ædicula ue in alteram partem to
ta cum ba&longs;i proclinati &longs;int: tunc &longs;ubleuabis qua &longs;ub&longs;idant:
aut &longs;ubdemes qua præ&longs;urgant.
Audax utrumque opus.

Prius
igitur et ba&longs;im et quæ di&longs;&longs;olui motu po&longs;&longs;int tignis et omni
illaqueatione bene coniugato et concingito.

Cingendi ge
nus commodum / erga&longs;cula cuneis per&longs;tricta &longs;ubleuabimus &longs;ub
mi&longs;&longs;a trabe in modum uectis: quod ip&longs;um &longs;tateram nuncu
pauimus .
Subdemes fo&longs;&longs;ura &longs;en&longs;im producta.
Ea fiet &longs;ic.

Nam
incipies a medio lateris &longs;ub ad radices imi pedamenti: et illic
ad profundum &longs;ubcides apertionem non multum latam: al
tam uero quoad eam ordinariis lapidibus firmi&longs;&longs;imis &longs;ub
&longs;titutis po&longs;itis ad arbitrium &longs;ubin&longs;ternere.

Apertionem hanc
&longs;ub&longs;truendo non ad &longs;ummum u&longs;que penitus completam reddes:
&longs;ed palmos aliquot relinques in uacuo: quos cuneis robu&longs;teis
non inter rari&longs;&longs;imis complebis.

Pari deinceps opere totum
&longs;uffulcies latus i&longs;tic &longs;acelli: quod inde pre&longs;&longs;ius &longs;idere uelis.

I&longs;ta ubi onus &longs;u&longs;ceperint / tu belle et cauti&longs;&longs;ime cuneos ip&longs;os
&longs;ubmoueas: pronum parietem ad iu&longs;tam perpendiculi recti
tudinem re&longs;titues.

Mox quæ inter cuneos interuacua pateant
&longs;ubfirmabis cuneis ex lapide firmi&longs;&longs;imo.

Apud romam ad
ba&longs;ilicam Petri maximam quod alæ parietum incolumis a per
pendiculo declinantes ruinam tectis minentur / &longs;ic excogitaram
Pronam parietis &longs;ingulam partem eam/ quam columna quæ
uis &longs;ub&longs;tineat / in&longs;titueram ab&longs;cidere: atque e medio amouere.

Idque parietis quod demptum e&longs;&longs;et / re&longs;tituere opere ordina
rio ad perpendiculum relictis inter&longs;truendum hinc atque hinc
dentibus lapideis an&longs;eoli&longs;que ualidi&longs;&longs;imis: quibus reliqua
&longs;tructuræ innouatio annecteretur.

Denique ad tectum trabem
cui proclinata muri pars &longs;ubadimenda e&longs;&longs;et commenda&longs;&longs;em
capreis machinis &longs;upra tectum erectis: firmatis hinc atque
hinc machinarum pedibus in tecti parieti&longs;que parte &longs;tabilio
re.

Hoc deinceps in alteris atque alteris columnis quantum
res po&longs;tula&longs;&longs;et effeci&longs;&longs;em.

Capra nauticum in&longs;trumentum est
tignorum trium: quorum &longs;umma capita in unum coniuncta fi
bulantur et connodantur: pedes autem in triangulum collo
cantur.

Hac machina adhibitis trocleis coclea ue ad onera
tollenda utimur commodi&longs;&longs;ime.

Cru&longs;tam uetu&longs;to parieti aut pauimento noui&longs;&longs;ime indu
cturus prius obluito aqua pura liquentique flore.

calcis immix
ta farina marmoris perenniculo dealbato: &longs;ic arenationes te
nebit.

In pauimenti &longs;ubdiualis rimulam &longs;i cineres in cerni
culo puratos oleo præ&longs;ertim linaceo &longs;ubegeris atque infu&longs;eris
&longs;tagnabit.

Huic operi commodi&longs;&longs;ima erit creta calce uiua be
ne &longs;ubacta et furno excocta et illico inducta ex oleo fi&longs;&longs;ura
prius omni puluere immuni reddita.

Id fiet ter&longs;ura pinarum
et multa follium &longs;ufflatura: et operis etiam elegantiam non negliga
mus.

Parietes &longs;i forte &longs;int altitudine informi ducito aut ope
re adpacto coronas aut pictura &longs;ectiones: quæ illam altitu
dinem aptis locis diuidant.

Sin autem erit paries nimium
oblongus: inducito a &longs;ummo ad imum columnas non nimium
frequentes / &longs;ed &longs;ubdi&longs;pan&longs;as.

Con&longs;i&longs;tet enim et remorabitur
intuitus qua&longs;i diuer&longs;oriis offen&longs;is ubi intorque&longs;cat atque mi
nus offendatur ua&longs;titate.
Hoc etiam faciat ad rem.

Multa qui
dem quod in loco depre&longs;&longs;iore &longs;ita quod ue parietibus cincta humi
lioribus &longs;int quam ratio po&longs;tulat: ea te minora et angu&longs;tiora ui
debuntur quam re ip&longs;a &longs;int.

Contraque multa po&longs;tea quam elatiora
reddita &longs;unt / adauctis pauimento pariete ue longe ui&longs;a dehinc
maiora &longs;unt quam prius uidebantur.

Et apertionibus commoda
tis / ho&longs;tio ue apertiore loco po&longs;ito: fene&longs;tris ue in parte pa
rietis cel&longs;iore adapertis / coenacula et man&longs;iones redactas con
&longs;tat / ut digniores multoque elegantiores habeantur.

Bapti&longs;ta &longs;iculus in auctoris per&longs;ona Ad lectorem
Ingenuum &longs;upere&longs;&longs;et opus nunc Dædale: &longs;i me
Legi&longs;&longs;es: ualidis uolitare per aera pennis
Vidi&longs;&longs;es teneri trepidantia brachia nati
Po&longs;&longs;et et Archimedes totum qua uerteret orbem
Inuenta gaudere ba&longs;i: curaque &longs;olutus
Siquis hyperboreos ardet di&longs;cindere montes:
Aemulus a&longs;&longs;iduo &longs;uperet babylona labore:
Condat et excel&longs;o pendentia culmina olympo
Velificatus athos narratur: iungere terras
Pontibus humana in&longs;truxit &longs;ollertia: &longs;ed te
non minus i&longs;ta iuuent uolumus quam pagina &longs;ignat.
Pugnabit no&longs;tra hæc armatos machina mutos
Cautius: hac poterit &longs;e &longs;e ho&longs;tis ab ho&longs;te tueri:
Terrigeni&longs;que minus nocui&longs;&longs;ent tæla tonantis:
Fru&longs;tra et trinacrii &longs;uda&longs;&longs;ent brachia fabri:
Encheladus &longs;icula nec iam premeretur harena.
Quo priuata domus / quo regia tecta &longs;truantur
Ordine: quo loca &longs;acra deum ornes: quoue prophana
Certus eris: quo rura colas: quam fertilis illinc
Surgat ager: læta ut capiant uix horrea me&longs;&longs;es:
Inde operum uitia emendes qua regula: quem ut
Qui&longs;que modum rebus tandem proponat agendis:
Accedit po&longs;t hæc romanæ gratia linguæ /
Si te forte iuuat / nulla palle&longs;cere culpa
Eloquii: eloquium hic est: quodque imiteris habebis /
Et quæ nulla tibi ueterum monumenta dedere /
Hic no&longs;ces: lecture meas &longs;i uoluere carthas
Non pigeat: loculi&longs;que tenax &longs;i parcere auaris
Dedi&longs;cas: largas &longs;i bibliopola &longs;onanti
Impleat ære manus.
No&longs;tros legi&longs;&longs;e labores
Non te poeniteat: celeri quos callidus arte
Impre&longs;&longs;or doctæ per&longs;trinxit robore dextræ .
